Hey there, how’s it going? I’m Alex.
Hi Alex! I’m Taylor. Nice to meet you.
Nice to meet you too. How’s your day been?
Pretty good, thanks for asking. How about yours?
It’s been busy, but good overall.
That’s great to hear. I just finished a painting.
Wow, that’s awesome, Taylor! I’d love to see it sometime.
Sure thing! Maybe next time we meet.
Speaking of which, are you free this weekend?
I think so. Do you have plans?
I was thinking of checking out that new cafe downtown.
That sounds fun! Count me in.
Great, let’s meet there at 2 PM on Saturday.
Perfect! I’ll see you then, Alex.
See you, Taylor. Have a good night!
You too, Alex. Good night!
On Saturday, Alex and Taylor met at the cafe.
This place has such a cozy vibe, doesn’t it?
Definitely. The decor is really nice too.
Yeah, and the coffee smells amazing.
They enjoyed their drinks and chatted for hours.
Thanks for hanging out today, Taylor.
No problem, Alex. I had a blast.
Let’s do this again soon.
For sure! I’m looking forward to it.
Until next time, Taylor.
Until next time, Alex.
